name: Poison Weird
resist: fire; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, restrained, prone, unconscious

trait.name: Invisible in Water
text: The poison weird is invisible while fully immersed in water.

trait.name: Water Bound
text: The poison weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

action.name: Constrict
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and pulled 5 feet toward the poison weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the poison weird tries to drown it, and the poison weird can't constrict another target.

description: Source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage p. 127
